Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Action.A_DeployScorpio
Section.SkillDescription: Gain the ability to deploy a Scorpio Turret that automatically fires at enemies. The Scorpio Turret also has shields that can be used as cover.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.ActionElemental.Scorpio_CorrosiveBolt
Section.SkillDescription: The Scorpio deals corrosive damage

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.ActionElemental.Scorpio_ExplosiveBolt
Section.SkillDescription: The Scorpio deals Explosive Damage

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.ActionElemental.Scorpio_FireBolt
Section.SkillDescription: The Scorpio deals Fire Damage

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.ActionElemental.Scorpio_ShockBolt
Section.SkillDescription: The Scorpio deals shock damage

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Adrenaline.Adrenaline_Roland
Section.SkillDescription: Roland gains adrenaline when he damages enemies or if one of his friends gets crippled.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Infantry.Assault
Section.SkillDescription: Increases Magazine Size and reduces Recoil with Combat Rifles.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Infantry.GuidedMissile
Section.SkillDescription: Your Scorpio Turret launches guided missiles in addition to using its regular gun.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Infantry.MetalStorm
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases your Fire Rate and reduces Recoil for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Infantry.Refire
Section.SkillDescription: Shooting an enemy reduces the Cooldown of your Scorpio Turret. This effect can only occur every 2 seconds.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Infantry.Refire_activated
Section.SkillDescription: Shooting an enemy reduces the Cooldown of your Scorpio Turret.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Infantry.Scattershot
Section.SkillDescription: Increases shotgun damage and spread.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Infantry.Sentry
Section.SkillDescription: Increases Scorpio Turret damage.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Medic.AidStation
Section.SkillDescription: Allies near the Scorpio Turret regenerate health.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Medic.Cauterize
Section.SkillDescription: Shooting team members heals them. This effect also works with grenades and rockets.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Medic.Fitness
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your Maximum Health.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Medic.Fitness_HealUp
Section.SkillDescription: Heals you after increasing your Max Health.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Medic.Grit
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your resistance to Bullet Damage.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Medic.Overload
Section.SkillDescription: Increases magazine capacity with all weapon types.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Medic.Revive
Section.SkillDescription: The Scorpio Turret has a chance to instantly revive nearby crippled friends when deployed.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Medic.Stat
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases health regeneration for you and nearby friends for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Support.Barrage
Section.SkillDescription: Increases the number of shots your Scorpio Turret fires in each burst.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Support.Defense
Section.SkillDescription: Increases how quickly your shields recharge.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Support.deploy
Section.SkillDescription: Reduces the cooldown for your Scorpio Turret.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Support.Grenadier
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases your grenade damage and causes you to regenerate grenades for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Support.Impact
Section.SkillDescription: Increases Bullet Damage with all weapon types.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Support.QuickCharge
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy causes your shields to quickly regenerate for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Support.Stockpile
Section.SkillDescription: Players near the Scorpio Turret regenerate ammo for the weapon currently in their hands.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.Support.SupplyDrop
Section.SkillDescription: The Scorpio Turret periodically fires out supply pickups to resupply players.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.z_DELETEDELETE.Detonate
Section.SkillDescription: The Scorpio Turret creates a pulse every few seconds that pushes enemies away and damages them. (BROKEN)

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.z_DELETEDELETE.Detonate_active
Section.SkillDescription: The Scorpio Turret creates a pulse every few seconds that pushes enemies away and damages them.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Roland.z_DELETEDELETE.ScoprioHomingRockets
Section.SkillDescription: The Scorpio Turret fires homing rockets in addition to its regular attack.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Action.A_PhaseWalk
Section.SkillDescription: Gain the ability to turn invisible and move incredibly fast. Upon entering and leaving Phasewalk you create a Phase Blast that damages nearby enemies. You can Melee attack to end Phasewalk early.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Action.PhaseWalk_meleeCancel
Section.SkillDescription: Using a melee attack while Phasewalking deals additional damage.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.ActionElemental.CorrosiveReturn
Section.SkillDescription: ACTION ELEMENTAL SKILL: Causes a corrosive explosion entrance/exit when Phasewalking

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.ActionElemental.ExplosiveReturn
Section.SkillDescription: ACTION ELEMENTAL SKILL: Causes an explosive entrance/exit when Phasewalking

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.ActionElemental.IncendiaryReturn
Section.SkillDescription: ACTION ELEMENTAL SKILL: Causes an incindiary explosion entrance/exit when Phasewalking

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.ActionElemental.ShockingReturn
Section.SkillDescription: ACTION ELEMENTAL SKILL: Causes a shock explosion entrance/exit when Phasewalking

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Adrenaline.Adrenaline_Lilith
Section.SkillDescription: Roland gains adrenaline when he damages enemies or if one of his friends gets crippled.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.Blackout
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy reduces the cooldown of Phasewalk.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.Blackout_activated
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy reduces the cooldown of Phasewalk

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.Enforcer
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases your accuracy and Bullet Damage for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.HighVelocity
Section.SkillDescription: Increases Bullet Damage and Velocity.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.HitAndRun
Section.SkillDescription: Gain increased melee damage and Phasewalk duration.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.PhaseStrike
Section.SkillDescription: Using a melee attack while Phasewalking deals additional damage.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.SilentResolve
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your resistance to damage for a few seconds after Phasewalking.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.SilentResolve_active
Section.SkillDescription: Gain resistance to all damage for 6 seconds after Phasewalking.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Assassin.Slayer
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your Critical Hit Damage.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.Diva
Section.SkillDescription: Increases the Capacity of your shield.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.DramaticEntrance
Section.SkillDescription: Your Phase Blast can Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.DramaticEntrance_active
Section.SkillDescription: When Phasewalk ends you cause an explosion that can Slow nearby enemies.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.GirlPower
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy causes your Shield to quickly regenerate for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.HardToGet
Section.SkillDescription: Decreases the Cooldown of Phasewalk.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.InnerGlow
Section.SkillDescription: While Phasewalking you regenerate Health.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.MindGames
Section.SkillDescription: Each bullet you fire has a chance to Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Controller.Striking
Section.SkillDescription: Your melee attacks can Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Intuition
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases your movement speed and the experience you and your team earn for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Phoenix
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy causes you to deal Fire Damage to nearby enemies and makes your shots not always cost ammo for a few seconds. The Fire Damage increases with your Level.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Quicksilver
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your Fire Rate with all weapons.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Radiance
Section.SkillDescription: You deal Shock Damage to nearby enemies while Phasewalking. Damage is based on your Level and the Skill's Level.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Resilience
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your resistance to Fire, Shock, Corrosive, and Explosive Damage.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.spark
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your chance of causing Elemental Effects with Elemental Weapons.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Lilith.Elemental.Venom
Section.SkillDescription: Adds Corrosive Damage to your melee attacks. Also, your melee attacks have a chance to Corrode enemies, causing additional damage over time.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Action.A_LaunchBloodwing
Section.SkillDescription: Gain the ability to send your pet Bloodwing out to attack an enemy and then return.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.ActionElemental.AcidWing
Section.SkillDescription: The Bloodwing deals Corrosive Damage

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.ActionElemental.ExplosiveWing
Section.SkillDescription: The Bloodwing deals Explosive damage

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.ActionElemental.FireWing
Section.SkillDescription: The Bloodwing deals Incendiary damage

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.ActionElemental.ShockWing
Section.SkillDescription: The Bloodwing deals Shock damage

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Adrenaline.Adrenaline_Mordecai
Section.SkillDescription: Mordecai gains adrenaline when he kills an enemy.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Gunslinger.Deadly
Section.SkillDescription: Increases Critical Hit damage.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Gunslinger.GunCrazy
Section.SkillDescription: When using pistols you have a chance to fire 2 shots with each pull of the trigger instead of just 1.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Gunslinger.HairTrigger
Section.SkillDescription: Increases Fire Rate and Magazine Size with pistols.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Gunslinger.LethalStrike
Section.SkillDescription: Increases melee damage. Also, every melee attack has a 35% chance to be a Lethal Strike and deal extremely high damage.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Gunslinger.LethalStrike_Crit
Section.SkillDescription: Increases melee damage and gives every melee attack a chance to deal double damage.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Gunslinger.Predator
Section.SkillDescription: Decreases the cooldown of your pet Bloodwing.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Gunslinger.Relentless
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases your fire rate and gives every bullet fired a 25% chance to be a Killer Shot and deal additional damage. This effect lasts a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Gunslinger.Relentless_Crit
Section.SkillDescription: Rushing increases your fire rate with all weapons and gives every bullet a chance to count as a critical hit regardless of where the bullet hit.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Gunslinger.RiotousRemedy
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy gives you chaotic health regeneration for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Gunslinger.RiotousRemedy_HealthGain
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy provides a random amount of health.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Rogue.AerialImpact
Section.SkillDescription: Attacks from your Bloodwing can Daze enemies, reducing their movement speed and accuracy.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Rogue.BirdOfPrey
Section.SkillDescription: Increases the number of targets the Bloodwing can attack before returning.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Rogue.FastHands
Section.SkillDescription: Increases Reload Speed with all weapon types.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Rogue.OutForBlood
Section.SkillDescription: When your Bloodwing strikes an enemy you gain health based on the amount of damage done.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Rogue.Ransack
Section.SkillDescription: Killling an enemy increases the amount of loot you get from other enemies killed for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Rogue.SwiftStrike
Section.SkillDescription: Increases Bloodwing Damage and movement speed.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Rogue.Swipe
Section.SkillDescription: The Bloodwing causes enemies to drop additional money, ammo, and healing items when it attacks.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Sniper.Caliber
Section.SkillDescription: Increases damage with Sniper Rifles.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Sniper.CarrionCall
Section.SkillDescription: Shooting an enemy with a Sniper Rifle reduces the cooldown of your Bloodwing.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Sniper.CarrionCall_activated
Section.SkillDescription: Hitting an enemy with a Sniper Rifle reduces the cooldown of Bloodwing.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Sniper.Focus
Section.SkillDescription: Increases accuracy with all weapon types.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Sniper.Killer
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases your Damage and Reload Speed with all guns for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Sniper.Loaded
Section.SkillDescription: Increases Magazine Capacity with Sniper Rifles.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Sniper.Smirk
Section.SkillDescription: All players on your team (including you) gain additional experience when you kill an enemy with a Critical Hit.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Sniper.Smirk_active
Section.SkillDescription: After killing an enemy with a Sniper Rifle the team gets a bonus to all experience gained for 10 seconds.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.Sniper.Trespass
Section.SkillDescription: Your bullets have a chance to ignore shields. Also slightly increases Bullet Damage.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.z_DELETEDELETE.Trespass_pistolDmg
Section.SkillDescription: Increased pistol damage from the Trespass skill.

Section.Name: gd_skills2_Mordecai.z_DELETEDELETE.z_DELETEDELETE
Section.SkillDescription: Pistols fire extra bullets with each shot

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Action.A_Berserk
Section.SkillDescription: Gain the ability to go Berserk. While Berserk, <StringAliasMap:Action.Fire> and <StringAliasMap:Action.Aim> throw punches. Also, you gain resistance to all damage and you regenerate health while Berserking.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.ActionElemental.CorrosivePunch
Section.SkillDescription: Brick's punch deals Corrosive Damage

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.ActionElemental.ExplosivePunch
Section.SkillDescription: Brick's punch deals Explosive Damage

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.ActionElemental.IncendiaryPunch
Section.SkillDescription: Brick's punch deals Incendiary Damage

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.ActionElemental.ShockingPunch
Section.SkillDescription: Brick's punch deals Shocking Damage

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Adrenaline.Adrenaline_Brick
Section.SkillDescription: Roland gains adrenaline when he damages enemies or if one of his friends gets crippled.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Blaster.CastIron
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your resistance to Explosive Damage.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Blaster.Liquidate
Section.SkillDescription: Dealing Explosive Damage to an enemy reduces the cooldown of Berserk.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Blaster.Liquidate_active
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy with Explosive Damage provides an experience bonus and reduces the cooldown of Berserk. (BROKEN)

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Blaster.MasterBlaster
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases your Fire Rate with all weapons and causes you to regenerate rockets for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Blaster.RapidReload
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your Reload Speed and reduces Recoil with all weapons.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Blaster.Revenge
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy increases your damage with all weapons for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Blaster.WideLoad
Section.SkillDescription: Increases the number of Rockets your Rocket Launcher can hold in its magazine.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Brawler.BloodSport
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy while Berserk is active regenerates some of your health.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Brawler.BloodSport_activated
Section.SkillDescription: While Berserk you gain increased damage with left handed attacks.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Brawler.EndlessRage
Section.SkillDescription: Increases the duration of Berserk.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Brawler.HeavyHanded
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy greatly increases your melee damage for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Brawler.IronFist
Section.SkillDescription: Increases the melee damage you deal.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Brawler.PrizeFighter
Section.SkillDescription: While Berserk is active your melee attacks have a chance to spawn cash prizes.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Brawler.ShortFuse
Section.SkillDescription: Decreases the Cooldown of Berserk.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Brawler.StingLikeaBee
Section.SkillDescription: Punching while Berserk causes you to dash forward and slug your enemies.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Tank.Bash
Section.SkillDescription: Gives your melee attacks a chance to Daze enemies, slowing them and reducing their accuracy.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Tank.Diehard
Section.SkillDescription: Increases the amount of health you regain when you are revived by a friend or by Second Wind. Also increases the amount of time you have before you die when you are Crippled.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Tank.Endowed
Section.SkillDescription: Increases the Explosive Damage you deal.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Tank.Hardened
Section.SkillDescription: Increases your maximum health.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Tank.Juggernaut
Section.SkillDescription: Killing an enemy gives you resistance to all damage for a few seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Tank.PayBack
Section.SkillDescription: After your shields become depleted you gain a damage bonus for 10 seconds.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Tank.PayBack_active
Section.SkillDescription: damage bonus for the payback skill

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Tank.Safeguard
Section.SkillDescription: Increases the strength of your shield.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Tank.Unbreakable
Section.SkillDescription: When your shield is depleted you gain 5 seconds of powerful shield regeneration.

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.Tank.Unbreakable_active
Section.SkillDescription: Shield regeneration for Unbreakable

Section.Name: gd_Skills2_Brick.z_DELETEDELETE.PrizeFighter_SpawnCash
Section.SkillDescription: While Berserk is active your melee attacks have a chance to spawn cash prizes.
